rukus.text: 54|24|gu tamen shuo: Women tongzu de yige fanren, women neng shuncong ta ma? Ruguo nayang, women biding xianyu mi wu he fengkuang zhi zhong.
54|25|Nandao ta zai women zhi jian duzi feng dao qishi ma? Buran, ta shi shuohuang zhe, shi aoman zhe.”
54|26|Tamen mingri jiang zhidao shei shi shuohuang zhe, shei shi aoman zhe.
54|27|Wo biding shi mu tuo kaoyan tamen, gu ni yingdang qidai tamen, bing yingdang jianren,
54|28|ni yingdang gaosu tamen, jing shui shi tamen he mu tuo suo jun fen de, ying de shuifen de, lunliuzhe dao jing bian lai.
54|29|Tamen ceng han lai tamen de pengyou, ta jiu na qi jian lai zaile mu tuo.
54|30|Wo de xingfa he jinggao shi zenyang de!
54|31|Wo que yi shi yi zhong baozha qu huimie tamen, tamen jiu bian cheng zao quan lan zhe suoyong de kumu.
54|32|Wo que yi shi “gulanjing” yiyu ji du, you jieshou quangao de ren ma?
54|33|Lu te de zongzu ceng fouren jinggao,
54|34|wo que yi shi feishazoushi de fengbao qu huimie tamen; wei lu te de xintu, wo zai liming shi zhengjiule tamen.
54|35|Na shi cong wo nali fachu de endian, wo ruci baochou ganxie zhe.
54|36|Ta que yi jiang wo de chengzhi jinggao tamen, dan tamen yi huaiyi de taidu fouren jinggao.
54|37|Tamen que yi youhuo ta, jiao ta buyao baohu ta de keren, dan wo tumole tamen de yanjing. Nimen changshi wo de xingfa he jinggao ba!
54|38|Yi zhong yongheng de xingfa zai zaochen que yi xijile tamen.
54|39|Nimen changshi wo de xingfa he jinggao ba!
54|40|Wo que yi shi “gulanjing” yiyu ji du, you jieshou quangao de ren ma?
